Powerful app for controlling your budget: Powerful app for controlling your budget
there is no category with such id: There is no category with such id
the main idea of the app: The main idea of the app is to help people easily(!) track their budget. The app makes it easy to keep the information about ALL of your incomes or expenses in a single place and much more.
about statistics: Also, Billionstraker is great when it comes to analyzing your expenses. You can see the whole picture of your expenses/incomes and plan your budget.
more over the has mobile version: App is fully responsive and can be perfectly used on mobile(Personally, that's my favorite option). Moreover, the PWA is coming soon.
so there is no reason not to check it ou: So there is absolutely no reason for you not to check Billionstraker out. Jump right in and see for yourself
first of all, you can always return to t: First of all, you can always return to this page from the header menu (top right corner). Everything you see here is applicable for mobile as well.
the main parts of the app are: The main components of the app are balance, categories and transactions. So let's start with creating your first balance!
the balance page is used for: The balance page is used for creating, updating and deleting all your balance.
after that let's create some categories: After that, it's a good idea to create some categories. Go to categories page, name the category and select its type.
the categories page is used for: The categories page is used for managing all of your categories.
now we are ready for transactions: Now we are ready for transactions. There are three different types: expenses, incomes and exchanges. I hope there is no problems with understanding what expense and income mean, but exchange can be a bit confusing. Exchange type comes in handy when you need to exchange your currencies(for example, when you exchange usd to euro or just withdraw money from an ATM).
time to explore the profile page: It is time to explore the profile page.
the profile page is used for: On the profile page you can see the information about your transactions and update/delete them.
the last but not least: The last but not least page is statistics page. Here you can see how much money you spent and earned during the specific period of time.
select dates range and balance: Select the dates range and balance and see the statistics in a form of pie chart or list.
that is all for the guidance: That is all for the guidance. Hope you will enjoy Billionstraker as much as I do. Feel free to contact me (gorapus@gmail.com) in case of any questions, bugs or features ideas.
if you read here: If you read here and did not do anything, why don't you start with creating the balance?
you need to have one balance: You need to have at least one balance and one category for this operation
you need to have two balance: You need to have at least two balance  for this operation
click on item to see transactions: Click on item to see transactions
